Unforgettable Comfort

Amenities

The Bstone Hotel stands out among Panama hotels, having been designed with both visitors and the local community in mind, and as a symbiotic extension of the surrounding environment. The property features six rental apartments, two restaurants, a cafe, art house cinema, lap pool, movement studio, squash courts, padel court and a Bamford Spa.

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: arick
item.content:encoded:
Unforgettable Comfort

The finest hotel near Panama Beach

Learn More

Amenities

The Bstone Hotel stands out among Panama hotels, having been designed with both visitors and the local community in mind, and as a symbiotic extension of the surrounding environment. The property features six rental apartments, two restaurants, a cafe, art house cinema, lap pool, movement studio, squash courts, padel court and a Bamford Spa.

Restaurant

Flat Screen TV

Spa Treatments

Driks Bar

Free Wifi

Golf Course

air conditioning

Car Parking

Our Rooms

Penthouse Suite

Nam quis enim pharetra, finibus nulla id, lacinia enim.

$89

Family Double

Vivamus consequat sem ac rhoncus suscipit.

$129

Executive Room

Proin mollis odio vitae lorem condimentum.

$189

View All Rooms

Our Special
Rates & Promos

Our rooms are designed to transport you into an environment made for leisure. Take your mind off the day-to-day of home life and find a private paradise along beaches of Barcelona.

More Offers

Classic Room

$159

Deluxe Room

$199

item.title: Room Detail
item.dc:creator: arick
item.content:encoded:
Double Room

Starting from $199 / night

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, eos diam intellegat interesset te, vivendo intellegam sea no. Ceteros molestiae gubergren has no. Sed ei placerat tractatos.

Quo vidisse eruditi vocibus at, movet veniam vituperata vim eu, mea iusto feugait at. Nam no ferri animal regione, errem dictas perfecto vix in.

Amenities

Restaurant

Flat Screen TV

Spa

Driks Bar

Free Wifi

Golf

air conditioning

Car Parking

Starting from $199 / night

Check Availability

What Others Say

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, eos diam intellegat interesset te, vivendo intellegam sea no. Ceteros molestiae gubergren has no. Sed ei placerat tractatos. Quo vidisse eruditi vocibus at, movet veniam vituperata vim eu, mea iusto feugait at. Nam no ferri animal regione, errem dictas perfecto vix in. Lauren Hills
